name: Lucian
subtitle: the Purifier
description: Lucian, a Sentinel of Light, is a grim hunter of undying spirits, pursuing them relentlessly and annihilating them with his twin relic pistols. After the wraith Thresh slew his wife, Lucian embarked on the path of vengeance—but even with her return to... See More

abilities.name: Lightslinger
abilities.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot. When Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy Champion is immobilized, his next 2 basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Piercing Light
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

abilities.name: Ardent Blaze
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Move Speed for attacking marked enemies.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
